overview: A lament of love and emotions lost in time. The spirit of Joanna looks back at a time when she was in love and all her future was full of joy with the man of her dreams. Letting go of her sorrow, Joanna now understands that things can never be all we hoped for. We need to live our life to the fullest. Being thankful of the little moments that bring us happiness. A bitter sweet remembrance of the beginning and ending of a relationship, of what could have been a lasting romance but was not to be.
tagline: A lament of love and emotions lost in time.
title: God for a Day
